description: This resource represents an individual schema version of a schema defined in Glue Schema Registry.

Schema.description: Identifier for the schema where the schema version will be created.

SchemaArn.description: Amazon Resource Name for the Schema. This attribute can be used to uniquely represent the Schema.

SchemaName.description: Name of the schema. This parameter requires RegistryName to be provided.

RegistryName.description: Name of the registry to identify where the Schema is located.

SchemaDefinition.description: Complete definition of the schema in plain-text.

VersionId.description: Represents the version ID associated with the schema version.
